title: लॉकडाउन 4.0 : दिल्ली की बसों में सोशल डिस्टेंसिग फ़ॉलो न होता दिखाने वाला वीडियो मार्च का है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
This video was actually shared by the DTC Karamchari Ekta Union on its whatsapp group at 9:04 pm on March 27, 2020 https://t.co/Y54sWLNfFv pic.twitter.com/aomYEZBcws

The decision of allowing buses to operate in #Delhi in the midst of the #CoronavirusPandemic during #lockdown4 clearly needs a rethink; this video shared by the DTC Karamchari Ekta Union from the Sultanpuri Bus Terminal this morning says enough https://t.co/twvZ4ymxEApic.twitter.com/BN4r0rhKnE
